definition[0]: if someone, especially a man, is gay, they are sexually attracted to people of the same sex
example[3]: a campaigner for gay rights  (=equal treatment for gay people)
example[5]: She felt excited and quite gay.
definition[3]: stupid or not good. Some people think that this word is offensive.
example[6]: That was a gay thing to do!
definition[4]: someone who is homosexual, especially a man
